description:
In under an hour, learn how to build an email list and then turn that email list into paying customers using Wishpond's online marketing platform. This course will cover the basics of how to acquire emails, what strategies can be used to optimize a lead capture form, how to segment and categorize your leads, and instructions on how to run a basic email drip campaign.

Using real examples such as a landing page ebook which Wishond uses to generate over 500 leads a month, this course will walk you through step-by-step how to create and optimize a successful lead capture campaign from start to finish.

Whether your new to online marketing or are a seasoned pro, this course will provide actionable advice which can help generate more sales.
title: Use Wishpond to easily double your email list and get sales.
